BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: THE JOHN R SELMAN & MAGGIE B SELMAN

CapGainsLossTxInvstIncmGrp.PropertyDesc: 1,234 SH REAL ESTATE SELECT SECT SPDR

SummaryOfDirectChrtblActyGrp.Description1Txt: THE JOHN R. SELMAN AND MAGGIE B. SELMAN CHARITABLE TRUST HAS BEEN CREATED TO PROVIDE FUNDS FOR CHARITABLE ACTIVITIES, EDUCATION ACTIVITIES AND SIMILAR ACTIVITIES IN AND AROUND THE GENERAL AREAS OF SEALY, TX, PROVIDED THAT THESE ORGANIZATIONS ARE THE TYPES OF ORGANIZATIONS ORGANIZED AND OPERATED EXCLUSIVELY FOR RELIGIOUS, CHARITABLE, SCIENTIFIC, LITERARY OR EDUCATIONAL PURPOSES, AND WHICH ARE DESCRIBED IN INTERNAL REVENUE CODE SECTION 170(C) AND INTERNAL REVENUE CODE SECTION 2055(A)(1),(2) AND (3). EXAMPLES OF ORGANIZATIONS ARE LISTED IN THE PURPOSE CLAUSE OF THE TRUST DOCUMENT AND INCLUDE PUBLIC SCHOOLS, PARKS, LIBRARIES, RECREATION FACILITIES, FIRE DEPARTMENTS, EMERGENCY MEDICAL SERVICES, SOCIAL SERVICE ORGANIZATIONS, ANIMAL RESCUE FACILITIES AND EDUCATIONAL FACILITIES. IT IS INTENDED THAT THE JOHN R. SELMAN AND MAGGIE B. SELMAN CHARITABLE TRUST MAKE INVESTMENTS AND USE THE PRINCIPAL AND INTEREST TO MAKE ANNUAL DISBURSEMENTS TO QUALIFIED ORGANIZATIONS.

ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.FormAndInfoAndMaterialsTxt: THE ONLY ORGANIZATIONS WHICH ARE ELIGIBLE FOR GRANTS OR DISTRIBUTIONS ARE CHARITABLE ORGANIZATIONS, DONATIONS TO WHICH QUALIFY FOR A DEDUCTION UNDER THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE. THIS IS SET OUT IN THE TRUST DOCUMENT CREATING THE JOHN R. SELMAN AND MAGGIE B. SELMAN CHARITABLE TRUST. IT IS NOT EXPECTED THERE WILL BE ANY RELATIONSHIP BETWEEN ANY ORGANIZATION RECEIVING A GRANT OR DISTRIBUTION AND THE JOHN R. SELMAN AND MAGGIE B. SELMAN CHARITABLE TRUST OR THE CO-TRUSTEES OF THE JOHN R. SELMAN AND MAGGIE B. SELMAN CHARITABLE TRUST.
ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.RestrictionsOnAwardsTxt: THE GRANT PROPOSAL WILL OBLIGATE THE RECIPIENT ORGANIZATION TO USE THE GRANT OF FUNDS FOR WHICH THE GRANT WAS MADE. THE GRANT PROPOSAL WILL REQUIRE A REPORT TO BE MADE AS TO HOW THE FUNDS WERE USED AND PRODUCTION OF BOOKS AND/OR RECORDS BY THE GRANTEE SUBSTANTIATING THE USE OF THE GRANT OF FUNDS IN THE MANNER INTENDED UNDER THE GRANT PROPOSAL. THE GRANT PROPOSAL WILL ACKNOWLEDGE THE AUTHORITY OF THE JOHN R. SELMAN AND MAGGIE B. SELMAN CHARITABLE TRUST TO WITHHOLD OR RECOVER GRANT FUNDS WHEN IT APPEARS THE FUNDS WILL BE MISUSED OR HAVE BEEN MISUSED. FOLLOW-UPS WILL BE CONDUCTED BY THE JOHN R. SELMAN AND MAGGIE B. SELMAN CHARITABLE TRUST TO ENSURE THAT THE GRANTS ARE PROPERLY USED FOR THE PURPOSE INTENDED.
